item.title: AI analytics 1 - Overview of dataset
item.description: Read in data and functions source("2018-02-21-ai-analytics/BDVis.R") ## Loading required package: ggplot2 ## Loading required package: dplyr ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union ## Loading required package: gridExtra ## ## Attaching package: 'gridExtra' ## The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr': ## ## combine CH1.demo<-readRDS("2018-02-21-ai-analytics/CH1.demo.RDS") CH2.demo<-readRDS("2018-02-21-ai-analytics/CH2.demo.RDS") Visualization procedure: Use the column name to quote the column, aggregate the column, see function col.
